Desc.entry: Project run by St Stephens Church, offering a listening ear and a helping hand to people who are in need in the local community of Netherthorpe and Upperthorpe. The church's team of volunteers can provide help and support including: regular or occasional friendly visiting, such as social visits, a cup of tea and a chat; English conversation; rearranging furniture to aid access and mobility; garden clearances; shopping for someone who has just returned from hospital; accompanying clients to appointments. Only people living in Netherthorpe or Upperthorpe will be eligible for consideration by the support project. Self or any referral.
